titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL314
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL314

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

19.Gadan bin Ḥafīd of Ẓalawm- 20.ān of the tribe of Gabʾān has married 21.and paid the bride price for ʾAbībaʿ from Gaza. 22.Laḥayān bin Saʿdʾīl of Yah- 23.irr of the tribe of Mawqah has married and paid 24.the bride price for Marʾat from ʿAynʾīl. 25.Yismaʿʾīl bin Dhuʾāb of Qawm 26.of the tribe of Yalqaẓ has married and paid the bride 27.price for Taḥyaw from Egypt. 28.Zaydʾīl bin Gabanān of 29.Bawsān of the tribe of Gabʾān has ma- 30.rried and paid the bride price for Laḥayʾab fr- 31.om Gaza. 32.ʿAbd bin Riʾāb of Ṣamaʿ 33.of the tribe of Gabʾān has married 34.and paid the bride price for ʾAmat Shamas from 35.Egypt.

of the tribe of Yalqaẓ has married and paid the bride
price for Taḥyaw from Egypt.
